name: Legend Of Tess
description:
"Legend of Tess"

Playing as Tess, you are challenged to complete her daily tasks.
Immerse yourself in the life of the last surviving person on an oil rig in a world consumed by water.

A Point & Click Puzzle/Adventure game by:

Christopher Boeckh
Katherine Tiedemann
Myriel Schigiol
Paul Joshua Adlung
